apiKeySectionDesc.message: Please enter your DeepSeek API Key. This key will be stored securely locally.

aiKeyNote.message: Note: AI generation requires a valid DeepSeek API Key.

extDescription.message: A Chrome extension to manage and use prompts efficiently.

configureApiKey.message: Configure API Key and other settings

managePromptsDescription.message: Here you can manage all your prompts, add new ones, edit, or delete existing ones.

apiKeySaveError.message: Error: Unable to save API Key.

apiKeyMissingError.message: DeepSeek API Key not found. AI features disabled. Please set it in settings.

autoTaggingLabel.message: Enable Automatic AI Tagging & Titling on Right-Click Save

aiTaggingSettingError.message: Failed to save AI tagging setting:

customSystemPromptLabelText.description: Label for the custom AI system prompt textarea.

promptNotesLabel.description: Label for the prompt notes input field.

promptNotesPlaceholder.message: Enter your personal notes for this prompt here...

tabMyPrompts.description: Tab label for My Prompts section

tabRecycleBin.description: Tab label for Recycle Bin section

recycleBinTitle.description: Title for the Recycle Bin page/tab

recycleBinEmpty.description: Message shown when recycle bin has no items

sourceUrlLabel.description: Label for the source URL of a prompt

customSystemPromptDescriptionText.message: If empty, a default prompt will be used. The ${langName} placeholder will be replaced with the current interface language (e.g., English or Chinese).
customSystemPromptDescriptionText.description: Description for the custom AI system prompt textarea.

promptEffectUrlPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the prompt effect URL input field.

deepseekApiKeyInputPlaceholder.message: Enter your DeepSeek API Key (e.g., sk-...)
deepseekApiKeyInputPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the DeepSeek API Key input field.

moveToRecycleBinConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to move the prompt "$title$" to the Recycle Bin?
moveToRecycleBinConfirmation.description: Confirmation message when a user tries to delete a prompt, which now moves it to the recycle bin.

addNewPromptButton.description: Button label for adding a new prompt

recycleBinRetentionLabel.description: Label for the recycle bin retention period setting.

recycleBinRetentionPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the recycle bin retention period input field.

recycleBinRetentionDescription.message: Prompts older than this will be automatically deleted from the recycle bin. Set to 0 for indefinite retention.
recycleBinRetentionDescription.description: Description for the recycle bin retention period setting.

createdOnLabel.description: Label for the creation date of a prompt.

duplicateButtonLabel.description: Label for the duplicate prompt button.

duplicateSuffix.description: Suffix added to the title of a duplicated prompt.

restoreButtonLabel.description: Label for the restore button in the recycle bin.

permanentlyDeleteButtonLabel.description: Label for the permanently delete button in the recycle bin.

clearRecycleBinButtonLabel.description: Label for the clear recycle bin button.

clearRecycleBinConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to clear the recycle bin? This action cannot be undone.
clearRecycleBinConfirmation.description: Confirmation prompt for clearing the recycle bin.

clearRecycleBinError.message: Failed to clear. Please try again.
clearRecycleBinError.description: Error message when clearing the recycle bin fails.

addNewPromptHeadingText.description: Heading for the add/edit prompt form

existingPromptsHeadingText.description: Heading for the existing prompts section

customSystemPromptLabel.description: Label for the custom system prompt textarea in settings.

customSystemPromptDescription.message: Define a custom system-level prompt that will be implicitly prepended to your actual prompts when interacting with certain AI models. This can be used to set context, tone, or provide specific instructions to the AI.
customSystemPromptDescription.description: Description for the custom system prompt feature in settings.

permanentlyDeleteConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this prompt? This action cannot be undone.
permanentlyDeleteConfirmation.description: Confirmation message when a user tries to permanently delete a prompt from the recycle bin.

shortcutSettingsHeading.description: Heading for the shortcut settings section.

siteSpecificActivationHeading.description: Heading for the site-specific shortcut activation feature.

siteSpecificActivationDescription.message: Activate shortcuts only on these websites. Enter one URL pattern per line (e.g., https://*.example.com/* or www.google.com). If empty, shortcuts are active on all sites.
siteSpecificActivationDescription.description: Description for the site-specific activation feature.

allowedSitesLabel.description: Label for the textarea where users input allowed websites.

saveAllowedSitesButton.description: Button text to save the list of allowed sites.

allowedSitesStatusLoading.description: Status message while loading allowed sites.

allowedSitesStatusSuccess.description: Success message after saving allowed sites.

allowedSitesStatusError.message: Error saving allowed sites. Please check console for details.
allowedSitesStatusError.description: Error message if saving allowed sites fails.

customizeShortcutsHeading.description: Heading for the shortcut customization section.

customizeShortcutsDescription.message: Manage your extension shortcuts, such as activating the prompt list or opening the main panel.
customizeShortcutsDescription.description: Description for the shortcut customization section.

customizeShortcutsButton.description: Button text to open Chrome's extension shortcut settings page.

customPromptShortcutKeyHeading.description: Heading for the custom prompt search shortcut key setting.

customPromptShortcutKeyLabel.description: Label for the custom shortcut key input field.

customPromptShortcutKeyDescription.message: Enter a single character (e.g., / or #). This key, when pressed in an editable field, will open the prompt search. Default is '/'. Changes apply after reloading pages.
customPromptShortcutKeyDescription.description: Description for the custom shortcut key setting.

customPromptShortcutKeyPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the custom shortcut key input field.

saveCustomShortcutKeyButton.description: Button text to save the custom shortcut key.

customShortcutKeySavedSuccess.message: Shortcut key saved successfully. Reload open pages for the change to take effect.
customShortcutKeySavedSuccess.description: Success message after saving the shortcut key.

customShortcutKeyInvalid.message: Invalid shortcut key. Please enter a single character.
customShortcutKeyInvalid.description: Error message for invalid shortcut key input.

customShortcutKeyDefaultNote.description: Note about the default shortcut key.

shortcutKeySavedSuccess.description: Success message after saving the shortcut key.

shortcutKeySaveError.message: Failed to save shortcut key. Please try again.
shortcutKeySaveError.description: Error message when saving the shortcut key fails.

shortcutKeyInvalid.message: Please enter a valid single character for the shortcut key.
shortcutKeyInvalid.description: Error message when an invalid shortcut key is entered.
